paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information including penetrance data from the study.

patients.demographics: 1 HBOC patient and 4 sporadic cancer patients

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One HBOC patient and four patients from sporadic cancer group were identified as carriers of the c.658delGT mutation.

functional_data.summary: The c.658delGT mutation is associated with breast cancer risk.

variants.population_frequency: 0.9% in Polish ovarian-stomach and ovarian cancer families; 1.9% in Portuguese breast cancer families; 0.09% in American breast cancer patients.
variants.additional_notes: The c.646delG mutation was found in three non-HBOC patients.
key_quotes: The frequency of the mutation c.658delGT in BRCA2 is 2% in the HBOC patient group and 0.51% in the consecutive breast cancer patient group.
